short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Seamlessly cross-post your tweets to Bluesky. Post once on X (Twitter) and automatically share to your Bluesky account.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension turns the post button on x.com into a button that posts both to X and Bluesky at the same time. 

Simply connect you Bluesky account in the settings and the button will automatically crossposts your tweets
